reviewText:
From shoutfactory.com

 Disc 1:

1. Designing Women 2. New Years Daze 3. Monette 4. On Suzannah 5. Ted Remarries 6. Killing All the Right People 7. Heart Attacks 8. Return of Ray Don 9. Big Haas and Little Falsie 10. The Wilderness Experience

Disc 2:

1. The Naked Truth 2. Stand and Fight 3. Nightmare from Hee Haw 4. Julia Gets Her Head Stuck In A Fence 5. Julia and Suzanne's Big Adventure 6. Foreign Affairs 7. A Blast From The Past 8. And Now, Here's Bernice 9. This is Art? 10. The Pride of the Sugarbakers
I enjoyed every episode
Classic is the correct word for this set of episodes...my fav.
Love this show. Don't know  how to choose a favorite. They're all great.

Not bad for the price. I wanted to bring a bit of Designing Women back. I used to watch this in the afternoon after school.. Along with The Golden Girls. I have always had an affinity for Julia Sugerbaker and Dorothy Zbornak.  While The Golden Girls are now on Hallmark -- though censored, which is annoying -- Designing Women is no longer on cable. I didn't have the money to buy all of their seasons as it's a bit pricey, in my opinion. But this two pack CDs of DW is a nice option to get a bit of them back. I do find the music a bit different and louder than when it was aired and in reruns-- I have to quickly turn my volume down, not to blow me ear drums out, and then turn it back up so that I can hear them talking. Their theme music, quality and volume of which were much better on TV. But that's the only thing that I find annoying.
Bought as a Christmas gift !! Excellent purchase !!
great
Perfect

An all time favorite!  This is a great show about southern women and about running a successful home designing business.  The characters are all different with different foibles, talents, and personality.  You will love how one of the southern belles tells people what she really thinks, leaving nothing to the imagination.  She is eloquent and fun to watch as she "tells people off".  This is a great DVD for stress relief and a good laugh.
I got this for my mom. She has always loved the show. She loved this DVD. It really does have the better known episodes.
Love me some Julie!  Great show!
love them

Not sure if these episodes would have made my personal top twenty but still this is a nice little compilation of "Designing Women".  Dipping back into the well of eighties television is a dicey proposition, experience keeps revealing that these programs don't hold up quite as well as one remembers.  This comedic series about two Atlanta sisters; Julia and Suzanne Sugarbaker run a design house along with three associates which ran for five season premiering in 1986.

The ensemble cast work well together and there are some funny bits to be sure.  Dixie Carter as Julia became famous for her amusing diatribes on any number of subjects.  Creator, Linda Bloodworth-Thomason is well known for her strong female characters and Julia is a prime example.  Any number of shows back then felt compelled to tackle social issues (AIDS, sexual assault, etc.) which when viewed today seem strained and awkward (especially for a comedy).  Probably the funniest is Delta Burke's former beauty queen Suzanne; she gets most of the best lines and her over the top narcissism is very entertaining.  Rounding out the cast are Annie Potts as designer Mary Jo Shively, Jean Smart as Charlene Frazier the office manager, and the wonderful Mesach Taylor as Anthony Bouvier the firms driver and delivery man.

Watching shows like these remind us how bad the decades fashions were, the big shoulders, the bigger glasses frames, and the even bigger hair styles.  Three and a half stars for this collection, still amusing in spots but material feels dated at times.
One of the Videos,number 2 is NOT showing. I'm still awaiting a replacement!
Love this show!
great dvd
thanks I got this item and I am happy with it thanks again

I bought this as a gift for someone else and realized how much I had missed the ladies at Sugarbaker's. I opened it and it is a great compilation of some really memorable episodes!  If you miss Susanne, Mary Jo, Julia and Charlene, this is a great option instead of buying the whole series.
Great !
Gave it as a Christmas gift. They loved it.
HILARIOUS
too funny
Superb and awesome DVD showing the multi-facet talents of the entire cast of Designing Women... Great addition to Your Home DVD Collection...
I love Designing Women!
The best of the Designing Women series.
Perfect A+++++++++
Absolutely timeless!! Watched every single episode over and over again. Ready to order the next couple of seasons!
ok
loved this show
LOVED this show!!
Designing Women have always been one of my favorites shows ever! I love them!
First disc was very enjoyable,but 2nd disc was cracked and unusable very disappointing
Fans will, of course, enjoy the episodes.  But I found the laugh track annoying, and the sound quality weak
Great shows. Love it
I loved this show when it was on the air. Now the best shows on one disk!
Love these oldies
Love this series. I will eventually collect them all.
Designing Women was a favorite TV show.  I love being able to watch it any time I want, and the plan is to buy some of the earlier seasons.
Love... have the whole series collection.
Loved this show! Good choice of episodes.
This is a great collection of so e ofthrckassic episodes! A fun watch for any Designing Women fan!
Not thrilled with the selection referred to as classics. Should have just purchased the individual seasons.
Absolutely Love it.
These wouldn't have been the 20 shows I would have chosen. In fact almost all were chosen from one of the early season's.
Southern Belles stick together! I love Dixie Carter! She is the ultimate Southern Belle...beautiful, witty, intelligent, poised, confident and above all...A Lady!
This is superb if you like Designing Women as much as I do. It is well worth the money for eight hours of laughs, I would buy more if they had them. I loved it!!!  Judy Ramsey

I love Designing Women and I highly recommend this to any Designing Women fans. It's great to pop in the DVD player and boost your mood. It holds tons of laughs and reminds us all what being in the South is all about.
I would recommend this product to everyone who watched the shows when they originally aired.  Such a funny and touching show.
Great collection of shows. Any DW fan would love watching these and trying to recall the lines and what might happen next.

I don't know who decided or how they decided what episodes were included . Ex: Why would you have  " The Return of Ray Don "
without the original Ray Don  episode ?

They did include one of my top picks---" Julia and Suzanne's Big Adventure " .

It was good to see these episodes again. With any compilation there are going to be 1 or 2 you wished were on there but the selection on this is rounded enough to justify getting it.
I recommend it if you have an itch to watch a few episodes but don't want to buy the first 5 seasons. Overall really good.
I watch all the reruns of Designing Women and now that I have the DVD, I am enjoying watching them over and over.
I love this show but the DVD picture quality is very, very poor.  It is not my dvd player nor my television.  It is the DVD itself.
I got this for my mom as a gift for Mother's Day and she LOVES it. What else is there to say. I don't why these things need to bee 20 words or more.
Great show, great episodes. If you ever liked Designing Women you will remember 1 (or more) of these episodes. Classic characters and good plots make this a collection to have.

This show makes me smile and laugh some twenty plus years after it was first on the air! The wit and humor these women possess is amazing and even after seeing some episodes many times over they still make me laugh out loud!
it's a lot like watching the silly golden girls and almost as funny!  I just couldn't believe that there was more than one show with at least 1 comic. relief character.

I watched Designing Women when it first came on and have watched every rerun on TV. These women were strong, witty women who stood by their morals no matter what. I am excited to be collecting the cd's , so that when the reruns become too tame for stations to show (not enough sex, violence, or fowl language) I will have hours of entertainment.

These are timeless classics featuring main original cast thoroughly enjoyed and remembering of the show and how good it was. Laugh out loud funny and sometimes emotional always good in the end.  All your favorites are here..makes you want more!

With a terrific classic comedy, how does one choose only twenty shows to put into an anthology?  It's almost impossible, and that's why most viewers will find themselves loving the selections and simultaneously thinking that a past favorite didn't make the cut.  This certainly doesn't detract from the greatness of the episodes on this DVD collection.  For the ardent fan, this is an economical way to see lots of great, unedited shows.  If you want to see more, you probably need to buy the full-season box sets!

Shout sure knows how to get blood out of a turnip.  There are about half a dozen "timeless" episodes on this set, but not near what I'd hoped.  I'll be skipping this one and sticking with my season sets.  It's a pity, because I'm sure had there been more of the better "timeless" episodes ("They Shoot Fat Women, Don't They?" "The Beauty Contest," "Design House," "The Emperor's New Nose," "Blame It On New Orleans"...so many better episodes they could have chosen...this would have sold much better.

I was planning on buying over two dozen copies of this had the episode selection been better.  Sure, that's not a ton of money, but I'm sure I wasn't the only one.
This is one of my favorite tv shows. I would not have chosen a couple of the episodes in the group, but for the most part, it is a great collection.
Prompt shipment and great product!
love it
The sound quality is terrible! At max volume, static only gets louder but voices remain low.
Love these timeless women on these timeless shows!
This was one of our favorite TV shows and these are the best in the series.
The videos are fine and as funny as I remember but the case was all but destroyed.
I really liked this show
Nice to watch again
I always enjoyed this series and this collection has some of the most memorable episodes. The price is great and you will watch it again and again. "Foreign affair" is my favorite episode.
